Title: Establishes the office of consumer data protection and imposes a tax on data controllers and data processors
Summary: Enacts the "data economy labor compensation and accountability act"; establishes the office of consumer data protection for the purpose of properly safeguarding personal data; imposes a tax on data controllers and data processors required to register with such office.
LawCode: Add Art 51 §§1004 - 1007, Exec L; add §185, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the tax law, in relation to establishing the data economy labor compensation and accountability act
